td.content: s:pt presents with severe diarrhea for 2 weeks. patient also reports severe chest pain, severe fever, Respiratory. he is a 72 yo M retired. denies any alcohol use he denies smoking o:Height 64 in, Weight 158 lbs, Temperature 99 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Chest X-Ray shows right lower lobe infiltrate and abcess formation, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:administered clarithromycin - 250 mg 2xday, performed Chest X-Ray, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:a 73 yr old white m retired presents with 2 years history of severe fever. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he does not smoke o:Height 64 in, Weight 158 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 18, Chest X-Ray shows right lower lobe infiltrate and abcess formation, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:administered amoxicillin-clavulanate - 2 g 2 x day, performed Chest X-Ray, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
